Flag List System.

docs.title: Flag List
docs.text: Flag List expands the capabilities of Local List Variables by adding a boolean flag to each entry. This flag allows for manual and random flagging, enabling the marking of data entries.

docs.title: Example use case
docs.text: For instance, in restaurant reservation systems, when a customer is created, they need to be assigned a table seat. Each seat is represented as a marker in a Local List, flagged as occupied or free. This system facilitates random selection of a free seat for the customer's state machine and simplifies communication of seat availability to other customers.

docs.title: Setup
docs.text: To use this system you need to create a pool for your list by using Create Flag List Pool, give the pool a unique name and assign the Local List Vale to it's parameters
